title: RASL, Vol. 3: Romance at the Speed of Light
description: From the New York Times best-selling author of BONE comes a hardboiled sci-fi tale about a dimension-jumping art thief Â— a man unplugged from the world, racing through space and time searching for his next big score and trying to escape his past.Cartoonist Jeff Smith continues the critically acclaimed noir adventures of RASL, as the art thief tries desperately to hold on to anything constant in his fast changing world.Collects issues 8 to 11.
author: Jeff Smith
